body: For me it's +landscapes , +Propizza (because I helped make it) and +mansbestfriend
body_html: For me it's +Landscapes , +ProPizza (because I helped make it) and +MansBestFriend
title: What is your favorite guild on Ruqqus so far?

author.bio_html:
GM for +England, +AngloSaxon, +CANZUK, and +SwordsAndMore.

England lives.

body:
Popularity is an issue with a lot of guilds at the moment, so it's hard to tell. However I've been enjoying +AskRuqqus probably *because* there are fewer participants than in Reddit, so I guess that would be my favourite so far. +PoliticalCompassMemes is another favourite of mine, we just need more content.

And I have to mention the one I created: +AngloSaxon. Please join if you are interested!
body_html:
Popularity is an issue with a lot of guilds at the moment, so it's hard to tell. However I've been enjoying +AskRuqqus probably because there are fewer participants than in Reddit, so I guess that would be my favourite so far. +PoliticalCompassMemes is another favourite of mine, we just need more content.

And I have to mention the one I created: +AngloSaxon. Please join if you are interested!

guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.
